## ProgressItemEvents type

Events emitted by a ProgressItem instance

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ProgressItemEvents = {
    update: () => void;
    complete: () => void;
    remove: () => void;
    cancelled: () => void;
    pause: (bool: boolean) => void;
};
```
